version_description:
1.7.1 fixes a bug that prevented some users from viewing their items. Thanks so much to everyone who reported it!

WHAT’S NEW

SUBSCRIPTIONS
Now there's a new way to support Habitica: the iOS app now offers subscriptions! Subscribers help u

WHAT'S NEW

CHALLENGES

Now iOS users can view, join, and leave Challenges via the app! Easily add user-created tasks to your list, then compete against other Habiticans to win gems and achievements.

BUG FIXES

In this update, we've added new features including the ability to purchase equipment from the Market, performance fixes for chat, and accessibility improvements. We've also smashed a number of pesky bugs, including problems some users experienced with not

This update includes fixes to our VoiceOver compatibility, makes sure notifications only send once, cleans up some lingering UI issues while in dark mode, along with various other bug fixes.
We’ve also updated the price of the Dustbunny and Basi-list

This update introduces Apple sign in support! If you use a social login method, you can now add an additional email and password login through Settings.

Quests also got a few updates. You’ll now be notified when a quest is completed and shown the r

2.9: This update adds a few new features including the ability to purchase subscriber gems in bulk from the Market and the ability to gift gems to other users via Menu > Purchase Gems. We also refreshed some aspects of our UI and made other fixes and i

This update includes the ability to bulk buy eggs and hatching potions from the Market, and you’ll be warned if you try to buy more than needed to complete the relevant set of pets/mounts. We also refreshed the task screen design and made other miscellane

We fixed an issue that would leave some users not being able to see their items.

This update includes a pretty big visual overhaul! We refreshed the task list design to make it more sleek and reduce visual clutter. We hope you like it!
